resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103988</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103988</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205248</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Turbans: Ties to Religion and Culture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Turbans: Gleichheit zur Religion und zur 
Kultur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Turbans : Cravates à la religion et à la 
culture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Turbans: Laços à religião e à cultura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Turbans: Legami alla religione ed alla 
coltura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τουρμπάνια: Δεσμοί στη θρησκεία και τον 
πολιτισμό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Turbans: Lazos a la religión y a la 
cultura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The purpose of this lesson is to encourage students to examine various aspects of cultural identity. The students will view the film Turbans, which focuses on a Sikh family's immigration to Oregon in the early 1900s.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Zweck dieser Lektion ist, Kursteilnehmer 
anzuregen, verschiedene Aspekte der kulturellen Identität zu 
überprüfen. Die Kursteilnehmer sehen den Film Turbans an, der 
auf die Immigration einer Sikh Familie nach Oregon in den frühen 
1900s konzentriert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le but de cette leçon est d'encourager des 
étudiants à examiner de divers aspects d'identité culturelle. 
Les étudiants visualiseront le film Turbans, qui se concentre 
sur l'immigration sikhe d'une famille en Orégon au début des 
années 1900.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A finalidade desta lição é incentivar 
estudantes examinar vários aspectos da identidade cultural. Os 
estudantes verão a película Turbans, que focaliza no immigration de 
uma família de Sikh a Oregon nos 1900s adiantados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo scopo di questa lezione è consigliare agli 
allievi esaminare le varie funzioni dell'identità culturale. 
Gli allievi osserveranno la pellicola Turbans, che mette a fuoco
sull'immigrazione della famiglia di Sikh nell'Oregon all'inizio degli 
anni 1900.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σκοπός αυτού του μαθήματος είναι να ενθαρρυνθούν οι
σπουδαστές για να εξετάσει τις διάφορες πτυχές της πολιτιστικής 
ταυτότητας. Οι σπουδαστές θα εμφανίσουν τα τουρμπάνια 
ταινιών, το οποίο εστιάζει στη μετανάστευση μιας σιχ οικογένειας 
στο Όρεγκον στις αρχές των δεκαετιών του 20ου αιώνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El propósito de esta lección es animar a 
estudiantes que examinen varios aspectos de la identidad cultural. 
Los estudiantes opinión la película Turbans, que se centra en 
la inmigración de una familia de Sikh a Oregon en los 1900s 
tempranos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205248</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
